name: Void (itch) (Orbett Interactive)
description:
Description

Void, is a short and some what silly Sci Fi adventure game! When you get into the game, your goal is to collect 3 energy cores around the area, and bring them to the ship!

Once that is complete, you enter the void, where you must find and destroy the 3 Core Stations! Do not expect a polished gaming experience, as this was just a learning experience for me!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

'W A S D' - Movement

Right Click - Shoots a projectile

Left Click - Shoots a laser beam that can catch asteroids and actually shoot them back!

Mouse Movement - Aim

'E' - Action Button.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Enjoy!
